        public boolean addToGroup(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player,
                          String group)
        Description copied from interface: PermissionHandler
        Add the permission group of a player, if supported.
        Specified by:
        addToGroup in interface PermissionHandler
        Parameters:
        player - The player
        group - The name of the group.
        Returns:
        True if succeed, false otherwise. False is also returned if this feature isn't supported for the current permissions system.

      • hasGroupSupport

        public boolean hasGroupSupport()
        Description copied from interface: PermissionHandler
        Check whether the current permissions system has group support. If no permissions system is hooked, false will be returned.
        Specified by:
        hasGroupSupport in interface PermissionHandler
        Returns:
        True if the current permissions system supports groups, false otherwise.

      • hasPermissionOffline

                                    PermissionNode node)
        Description copied from interface: PermissionHandler
        Check if a player has permission by their name. Used to check an offline player's permission.
        Specified by:
        hasPermissionOffline in interface PermissionHandler
        Parameters:
        name - The player's name.
        node - The permission node.
        Returns:
        True if the player has permission.

      • isInGroup

        public boolean isInGroup(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player,
                         String group)
        Description copied from interface: PermissionHandler
        Check whether the player is in the specified group.
        Specified by:
        isInGroup in interface PermissionHandler
        Parameters:
        player - The player.
        group - The group name.
        Returns:
        True if the player is in the specified group, false otherwise. False is also returned if groups aren't supported by the used permissions system.

        Parameters:
